document.full_text: about 25 million americans, or 1 in 12 people, have asthma, a figure that is rising despite efforts to control key asthma triggers such as indoor smoking, u.s. government researchers said on tuesday.
document.title: u.s. asthma rates rising but reasons unclear: cdc
lines_and_colors: about 25 million americans, or 1 in 12 people, have asthma, a figure that is rising despite efforts to control key asthma triggers such as indoor smoking, u.s. government researchers said on tuesday.
